CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Form_1634__r.Patient_authorized_to_recieve_second_dos__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(Form_1634__r.Did_the_patient_die_after_self_administ__c, "1 - Yes") ), "1", IF( AND( Form_1634__r.Patient_authorized_to_recieve_second_dos__c = FALSE, ISPICKVAL(Form_1634__r.Did_the_patient_die_after_self_administ__c, "2 - No") ), "2", "N/A" ) )
CustomField.label: ADM_Q25
